CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 7, 1956, page A20, reads: "Radio Station WHOD broadcast from the fair each of the three evenings. Products advertised on WHOD made up their booth. Ace deejays, Mary Dee and Walt Harper are shown here, with Hazel Garland, Courier woman's page feature writer."
TitMainTitle: WHOD radio station disc jockey Mary Dee, Hazel Garland, and Walt Harper, standing in WHOD booth in Syria Mosque for 1956 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
